es.eucm.eadandroid.common.data.chapter.scenes
Class Scene

java.lang.Object
  es.eucm.eadandroid.common.data.chapter.scenes.GeneralScene
      es.eucm.eadandroid.common.data.chapter.scenes.Scene
All Implemented Interfaces:
Documented, HasId, Named, Positioned, Cloneable
public class Scene
extends GeneralScene
implements Positioned

This class holds the data for a scene in eAdventure
